Package org.cpnsim.statemanager

Interface SynState

All Known Implementing Classes:
SynStateSimple
public interface SynState
This SynState is used by the intra-scheduler for resource scheduling. Before the intra-scheduler starts scheduling, it will get the SynState from the StatesManager. The SynState contains the state of all hosts in the datacenter in the intra-scheduler's view. The intra-scheduler will only use the SynState to schedule the instances.
Since:
LGDCloudSim 1.0
Author:
Jiawen Liu

    • isSuitable

      boolean isSuitable(int hostId, Instance instance)
      Judging whether this instance is suitable to be placed on the host with hostId according to SynState
      Parameters:
      hostId - the id of the host.
      instance - the instance to be placed.
      Returns:
      true if the instance is suitable to be placed on the host, otherwise false.
